item.title: Spring Cloud Feign implements JWT token relay to deliver authentication information
item.description: In the process of Spring Cloud microservice invocation, you need to deal with token relaying, which is the only way to ensure the delivery of user authentication information in the invocation chain. Today we will share how to implement token relay in Feign. Token Relay To be clear, this means that the Token token is passed on between services to ensure that the resource server can properly authenticate the caller.
